title: Andy McDonald – 2021 Comments on Amazon Drivers
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Andy McDonald, the Shadow Employment Rights and Protections Secretary, on 1 April 2021.
content:
The results of this investigation are extremely concerning. Safety must absolutely always come first – before delivery targets and before profit.
